ygData.subject: Re: RaceWar & Bards
ygData.msgSnippet: I have been playing a Bard for a long time on the regular servers.  I went to the test server and decided to try something different.  After a few days I had
ygData.messageBody:
I have been playing a Bard for a long time on the regular servers. I went
to the test server and decided to try something different. After a few days
I had decided that when there real server came out I was going to use my old
trusty bard if nothing else because I could avoid that annoying root. Then
the news struck. Variant had restructured the code so root should be able
to stick even with accelerando. I haven't done any testing with it to know
how effective it is now though.

Also I have a question. Why do you even bother with the pets. If they
instigate the attack, take them out. Don't bother with the pets, they are a
waste of time. But thats just my opinion.

Mark
